posts.post_content: Basically, if my lands are snow covered, you attack me with a creature this enchants and your creature could possibly be reduced to becoming a 0/1. Not too shabby vs. powerful aggressive creatures. On your turn it possibly won't have any effect unless you're playing with snow covered lands
